r.s: Object-oriented interface to the session_* family functions
r.d: Object-oriented interface to the session_* family functions it provides extra features such as database storage for session data using DB package. It introduces new methods like isNew(), useCookies(), setExpire(), setIdle(), isExpired(), isIdled() and others.
r.n: Fixed errors in the DB storage container (thanks to Graeme Merrall)
